All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
Board
The board class holds all the information about the board including its initial state as well as methods to alter its state
Card
The Card class is a helper class for the different cards that players have in their hand to make guesses and final guesses to win the game.
Cell
Cell is an abstract class responsible for all the different cell types that make up the board It only holds the row and column as information
CharacterCard  
Estate
The estate class stores the information about the cells the estate is made up of as well as the players and weapons contained in its fields
EstateCard  
EstateCell
The estate cell class represents the estates on the board
FreeCell
The free cell class represents the free cells on the board that the players can move into
Game  
GreyCell
The grey cell class represents the grey cells on the board that the players can't move into
Move  
Player
The player class holds all the information about the player and its status in the game.
PlayerCell
The player cell represents each player on the board, this is just an extension of cell with a name for the player
Weapon
The Weapon class represents Weapons on the Board, not the WeaponCell but the actual Weapon object It stores information about the Weapon such as Name, Row and Column of where it is on the board and which Estate it is in
WeaponCard  
WeaponCell
The weapons cell class represents the weapons cells where the weapons are stored
